pullRequest.title: fix(misc): Adding retrofit2 impl as an option
pullRequest.bodyText:
Similar to how we have Retrofit1  providers/wrappers, adding a basic Retrofit2 impl.
Most of the current usage is Retrofit1 now except keel and if we decide to move to Retrofit2 for rest of the services , we will have a starting point.

commit.message: fix(misc): Adding retrofit2 impl to as an option
